§ Kehb

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Usirus** is a character from **18**.

§§ World 18

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空), as well as influenced by ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.

§§ About

**kehb** is a descendent of [[putah]].

**kehb** is //biologically immortal// — meaning that unless sometimes or someone kills him, he will continue to live on.

**kehb** is the father of [[usirus]].

Legend has it that **kehb** was able to create //landquakes//, and created the first serpents and dragons.

§§ Inspiration

The inspiration for the **Usirus** character from **18** is the **ancient Egytpian deity**: **Geb**.
Whose name is also sometimes spelled as: **Gebb**, **Keb**, **Kebb**, and **Seb**.

In //ancient Egytpian mythology// **Geb** is sometimes depicted as person with green skin.
